channel.title: How do I add hunter to my server?
channel.description: Please, a lot of people love my server. So now they want me to add more skills, I know how to tell a object to do something, and how to make it to teleport you somewhere and make it add skill experience, I just don't know how to make it add hunter exp, or if you know how to kill a npc and it will give you slayer/hunter exp. Please post how do do this.
